channel.title: Triangulated Categories on Writing what I'm learning

item.title: Exotic algebraic models
item.description: This blog-post is dedicated to this day, $\pi$-day (14th of march), where we celebrate $\pi_*$, the stable homotopy groups. As has been the case a couple of times already, when faced with an increased workload I tend to neglect writing on this blog. It is only natural that increased amounts of work in one section lead to a decreased amount of work in another â€” there is, after all, only a finite amount of time given to us.
